mapper.update: update t_voting_electionman set vId=#{vId},eId=#{eId},number=#{number} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select ve.eId,e.`name`,e.img,ve.number,v.title,v.endtime from t_voting_electionman ve JOIN t_voting v ON v.id=ve.vId JOIN t_electionman e ON e.id=ve.eId
SELECT e.`name`,e.id as uid,e.img,ve.number,ve.vId,v.vist,v.img as fm FROM t_electionman e JOIN t_voting_electionman ve ON e.id=ve.eId JOIN t_voting v ON v.id=ve.vId WHERE v.`status`=1
SELECT e.`name`,e.id as uid,e.img,ve.number,ve.vId,v.vist FROM t_electionman e JOIN t_voting_electionman ve ON e.id=ve.eId JOIN t_voting v ON v.id=ve.vId WHERE v.`status`=1 order by ve.number desc

SELECT SUM(a.number) as totle FROM( SELECT e.`name`,e.id as uid,e.img,ve.number,ve.vId,v.vist FROM t_electionman e JOIN t_voting_electionman ve ON e.id=ve.eId JOIN t_voting v ON v.id=ve.vId WHERE v.`status`=1) a
SELECT id,name FROM t_electionman WHERE deptId= #{id}
mapper.update: update t_voting_electionman set number=number+1 where eId=#{id}
